page.title: 13Life in Ayot St.Lawrence:1
page.content: There are very many different organizations that people belong to. Several of these are connected with farming and the countryside, for example, The National Farmers' Union. There is also a wide variety of occupations ranging from owning an Interior Design School in London to farming at home.Most people who live in the area do not work in the village.Many of them travel to near by towns or commute to London.Quite a few people take part in the leisure activites of craft,ceramics,music,art and drama.Gardening,walking and fishing are also popular. There is no gas in the village so most people use solid fuel or oil for central heating and electricity for cooking. As houses are very old, few have double glazing.
